description:
In the past people had to depend on doomsday preachers and apocalypse prophets to find out if the Earth was coming to and end.
Not anymore.
With "The End?" anyone can find out if today is the day the world will end with just a simple screen tap.
Here is what one of our "users" had to say:
"I used to depend on the street preacher down on the corner to know if the world was ending.  Now that I have 'The End?' I no longer have to make the daily trek to the corner to find out. Just a quick tap on my phone and I know how to plan my day!  And it's been more accurate than the old method which is a plus."
-I.M. Fake

If you too want to avoid the daily trek get "The End?" today & enjoy the ability to easily see if the Earth is ending!

Note: "The End?" is for entertainment purposes only.
